document.full_text: chris kreider started the scoring and the united states cruised to a 5-1 victory over austria in its opening game at the world ice hockey championship saturday.
document.title: us tops austria 5-1 in opener at ice hockey worlds
lines_and_colors: chris kreider started the scoring and the united states cruised to a 5-1 victory over austria in its opening game at the world ice hockey championship saturday.
